tool_description: Verify Email Now reduces your bounce rate to almost zero by getting rid of ALL undeliverable emails.
name: Verify Email Now
title: Verify Email Now

api_list.name: verifyEmail
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://verify-email-now.p.rapidapi.com/ms-email-verifier-api/public/api/v1/verify-email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "verify-email-now.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
